instructions: Open the Settings app. Go to Passwords & Accounts (formerly Accounts & Passwords ). Go to the Accounts section and choose an email account. Tap the email address again where it says Account . Scroll to the bottom and select Advanced . In the Move Discarded Messages Into section, choose either Deleted Mailbox or Archive Mailbox . This determines whether you see a Delete button or an Archive button when you swipe in Mail. Confirm that Deleted Mailbox redirects to Trash if you want to swipe to delete emails. When you set swiping to Archive instead of delete, set the Archive Mailbox to All Mail . Tap Account at the top of the screen, or swipe in from the left, to return to the previous screen. Finish by selecting Done .
